title: long/58
text:
!!! Sentence
<<<
But, for a small group of students, professional training might be the way, since well-developed skills, all other factors being equal, can be the difference  between having a job and not.
<<<
---

!!! Translate
<<<
"""但是， 对于小部分学生来说， 专业训练也许是一个可取的方法，因为如果其他因素都相同的话， 娴熟的技能决定了他们是否能够获得一份工作。
"""
<<<
